title: Riot PLEASE ANSWER ME PLease...About Neo Pax Sivir
body: Hey i send ticket for Neo Pax Sivir with code,summoners name and region.3 days I have no answer,i have no skin and the code will expired today.Can you please help me today.My ticket number is 31718245.

replies.body: Hey our game team is having a higher volume than usual, so it may be a bit.  I did check your ticket, and it looks like it was addressed in 31698988.  Be careful not to make too many tickets on the same issue, it can end up causing delays or confusion.  It looks like everything has been taken care of, though!  :D
